__e: I got a look at that dump a while ago... and if they don't have a wax figure of Joan Gale, then I'm crazy.
Some people might say that it's wrong for a man to love a wax replica of himself.
Can you believe that something so fun can be made of paraffin wax?
Aye, sir, but they wouldn't be pretty enough for the modern taste.
They said I looked pretty good for a girl who's been in a coma for three days.
You look pretty good for a guy who's been through what you've been through.
It was a little long, but Michael Cera was adorable as always.
Guess if Michael Cera's gone, it's not a total loss, huh?
I think that will come out easy.
